abilities.name: TELEPATHIC
abilities.description: At the end of the strategy phase, place the Naalu "0" token on your strategy card; you are first in initiative order.

abilities.name: FORESIGHT
abilities.description: After another player moves ships into a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, you may place 1 token from your strategy pool in an adjacent system that does not contain another player's ships; move your ships from the active system into that system.

flagship.name: Matriarch
abilities: During an invasion in this system, you may commit fighters to planets as if they were ground forces. When combat ends, return those units to the space area.

base.name: Gift of Prescience
base.effect: At the end of the strategy phase: Place this card face-up in your play area and place the Naalu "0" token on your strategy card; you are first in the initiative order. The Naalu player cannot use their TELEPATHIC faction ability during this game round.
base.returnCondition: Return this card to the Naalu player at the end of the status phase.

base.name: Z'eu
base.ability: After an agenda is revealed: You may exhaust this card to look at the top card of the agenda deck. Then, you may show that card to 1 other player

omega.name: Z'eu
omega.ability: ACTION: Exhaust this card and choose a player; that player may perform a tactical action in a non-home system without placing a command token; that system still counts as being activated.

base.name: M'aban
base.unlockCondition: Have 12 fighters on the game board
base.ability: You may produce 1 additional fighter for their cost; these additional units do not count against your PRODUCTION limit

omega.name: M'aban
omega.unlockCondition: Have ground units in or adjacent to the Mexatol Rex system
omega.ability: At any time: You may look at your neighbours' hand of promissory notes and the top and bottom card of the agenda deck.

base.name: The Oracle
base.ability: At the end of the status phase: You may force each other player to give you 1 promissory note from their hand. If you do, purge this card.
